thread.title: Lawyer for Ex-Cuomo Aide Says ‘Ziti’ References Aren’t Proof of Crime

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Lawyer for Ex-Cuomo Aide Says ‘Ziti’ References Aren’t Proof of Crime
text:
Referencing “The Sopranos” is not a crime.
That sentiment regarding the HBO hit series was part of the closing argument given Wednesday by a lawyer for a former top aide to Gov. Andrew Cuomo, following a six-week corruption trial that featured the “Sopranos” term ziti—or cash—prominently.
“Millions of people would be in jumpsuits for having...
